description: This file contains code that sets up an agent to query stock prices using a language model and tools, then prints metrics and responses.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with language models and tools to perform tasks.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Represents the response stream from the agent's run method.

classes.name: LlamaOpenAI
classes.description: Model configuration class for Llama OpenAI models.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for fetching financial data from Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: pprint_run_response
methods.description: Pretty prints the run response stream.

methods.name: pprint
methods.description: Pretty prints objects, used here for metrics and session metrics.
